name: Squiddish Skirmish
description:
One controller, two players! Battle squids and build a raft to escape your prison, or blast ink to keep your captive on the island!

(Squiddish Skirmish requires XNA 4.0 and an Xbox 360 controller!)


CODE: Ian Campbell (@BootdiskRev)

ART: Justin Chan (@justinchans)

AUDIO: Joonas Turner (@KissaKolme)


Made at TOJAM12 in 30 hours over 3 days! Please enjoy! :)
